packages.name: Intensive Fortnight
packages.description: Discount will be applicable on subsequent consultations in the following 2 weeks after an initial consultation. Only applicable to one body part at a time.

packages.name: Wellness Package
packages.description: No expiry date for the package

questions.question: Can I use Medicare or private health insurance on a program and package?
questions.answer: You can either Medicare or private health insurance on the program and package.

questions.question: How do I know whether a program or package suits me?
questions.answer:
An intensive week program is designed for clients who need multiple intensive treatments and exercises rehabilitation for optimal recovery.

A wellness package is designed for clients who need ongoing physiotherapy for long-term management.

questions.question: How does a physiotherapy program work?
questions.answer: The aim of an intensive week program is to make the treatment sessions more affordable especially for clients who need intensive treatments for optimal recovery. A discount will be applicable on follow-up consultations in the following week after the initial consultation.

questions.question: What do I expect during free initial assessment?
answer: Free advice on how physiotherapy can help and self-management strategies
Free recommendations for ongoing physiotherapy plan
